exceptions.exn: In environment drop := fun n : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => list nat -> list nat) (fun l : list nat => l) (fun (_ : nat) (Hrecn : list nat -> list nat) (l : list nat) => Hrecn match l with | nil => nil | _ :: l0 => l0 end) n : nat -> list nat -> list nat n : nat Unable to unify "match n with | 0 | _ => 0 end" with "codeNth n 0".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Found no subterm matching "codeNth n (codeList l')" in the current goal.

In environment drop := fun n : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => list nat -> list nat) (fun l : list nat => l) (fun (_ : nat) (Hrecn : list nat -> list nat) (l : list nat) => Hrecn match l with | nil => nil | _ :: l0 => l0 end) n : nat -> list nat -> list nat n, x : nat l' : list nat IHl : codeNth n (codeList l') = nth n l' 0 Unable to unify "match n with | 0 => x | S m => nth m l' 0 end" with "codeNth n (S (cPair x (codeList l')))".

original: intros n l. induction l as [|x l' IHl]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHl. reflexivity.
